verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H7462>them<s%>, even to the shepherds, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that do <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H7462>themselves<s%>! should not the shepherds <S%H7462>feed<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>?

Ye <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%>, and ye <S%H3847>clothe<s%> you with the <S%H6785>wool<s%>, ye <S%H2076>kill<s%> the <S%H1277>fatlings<s%>; but ye <S%H1277>feed<s%> not the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>.

The <S%H2470>diseased<s%> have ye not <S%H2388>strengthened<s%>, neither have ye <S%H7495>healed<s%> that which was <S%H2470>sick<s%>, neither have ye bound <S%H2280>up<s%> that which was <S%H7665>broken<s%>, neither have ye brought <S%H7725>back<s%> that which was driven <S%H5080>away<s%>, neither have ye <S%H1245>sought<s%> that which was <S%H6>lost<s%>; but with <S%H2394>force<s%> and with <S%H6531>rigor<s%> have ye ruled over <S%H7287>them<s%>.

And they were <S%H6327>scattered<s%>, because there was no <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>; and they became <S%H402>food<s%> to all the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and were <S%H6327>scattered<s%>.

My <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H7686>wandered<s%> through all the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and upon every <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill<s%>: <S%H6629>yea<s%>, my sheep were <S%H6327>scattered<s%> upon all the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and there was none that did <S%H1875>search<s%> or seek after <S%H1245>them<s%>.
Therefore <S%H7462><s%>, ye shepherds, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>:

As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>, surely forasmuch as my <S%H6629>sheep<s%> became a <S%H957>prey<s%>, and my <S%H6629>sheep<s%> became <S%H402>food<s%> to all the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, because there was no <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>, neither did my <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H1875>search<s%> for my <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, but the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H7462>fed<s%> <S%H7462>themselves<s%>, and fed not my <S%H6629>sheep<s%>;
therefore <S%H7462><s%>, ye shepherds, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H7462>Behold<s%>, I am against the shepherds; and I will <S%H1875>require<s%> my <S%H6629>sheep<s%> at their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and cause them to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from <S%H7462>feeding<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>; neither shall the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> themselves any <S%H5337>more<s%>; and I will deliver my <S%H6629>sheep<s%> from their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, that they may not be food for <S%H402>them<s%>.
For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H1875>Behold<s%>, I myself, even I, will search for my <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and will seek them <S%H1239>out<s%>.

As a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> seeketh <S%H1243>out<s%> his <S%H5739>flock<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he is <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H6629>sheep<s%> that are <S%H6567>scattered<s%> <S%H1239>abroad<s%>, so will I seek out my <S%H6629>sheep<s%>; and I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them out of all <S%H4725>places<s%> whither they have been <S%H6327>scattered<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> and <S%H6205>dark<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And I will bring them <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, and <S%H6908>gather<s%> them from the <S%H776>countries<s%>, and will <S%H935>bring<s%> them into their own <S%H127>land<s%>; and I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, by the <S%H650>watercourses<s%>, and in all the inhabited <S%H4186>places<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%>.

I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them with <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%>; and upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of the <S%H4791>height<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall their <S%H5116>fold<s%> <S%H7257>be<s%>: there shall they lie down in a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5116>fold<s%>; and on <S%H8082>fat<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%> shall they <S%H7462>feed<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
I myself will be the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> of my <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and I will cause them to lie <S%H7257>down<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> that which was <S%H6>lost<s%>, and will bring <S%H7725>back<s%> that which was driven <S%H5080>away<s%>, and will bind <S%H2280>up<s%> that which was <S%H7665>broken<s%>, and will <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> that which was <S%H2470>sick<s%>: but the <S%H8082>fat<s%> and the <S%H2389>strong<s%> I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%>; I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them in <S%H4941>justice<s%>.

And as for <S%H859>you<s%>, O my <S%H6629>flock<s%>, thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H8199>Behold<s%>, I judge between <S%H7716>sheep<s%> and <S%H7716>sheep<s%>, the <S%H352>rams<s%> and the <S%H6260>he-goats<s%>.

Seemeth it a small <S%H4592>thing<s%> unto you to have <S%H7462>fed<s%> upon the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%>, but ye must tread <S%H7429>down<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet<s%> the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of your <S%H4829>pasture<s%>? and to have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> of the <S%H4950>clear<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>, but ye must <S%H7515>foul<s%> the <S%H3498>residue<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet<s%>?

And as for my <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, they <S%H7462>eat<s%> that which ye have <S%H4823>trodden<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and they <S%H8354>drink<s%> that which ye have <S%H4833>fouled<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%> unto <S%H8199>them<s%>: Behold, I, even I, will judge between the <S%H1274>fat<s%> <S%H7716>sheep<s%> and the <S%H7330>lean<s%> <S%H7716>sheep<s%>.

Because ye <S%H1920>thrust<s%> with <S%H6654>side<s%> and with <S%H3802>shoulder<s%>, and <S%H5055>push<s%> all the <S%H2470>diseased<s%> with your <S%H7161>horns<s%>, till ye have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them <S%H2351>abroad<s%>;
therefore will I <S%H3467>save<s%> my <S%H6629>flock<s%>, and they shall no more be a <S%H957>prey<s%>; and I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> between <S%H7716>sheep<s%> and <S%H7716>sheep<s%>.

And I will set <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> over <S%H7462>them<s%>, and he shall feed <S%H5650>them<s%>, even my servant <S%H1732>David<s%>; he shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H7462>them<s%>, and he shall be their shepherd.

And <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, will be their <S%H430>God<s%>, and my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>; I, Jehovah, have spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>.

And I will <S%H3772>make<s%> with them a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and will cause <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beasts<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%>; and they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>securely<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H3462>sleep<s%> in the <S%H3293>woods<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> them and the places round <S%H5439>about<s%> my <S%H1389>hill<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%>; and I will cause the <S%H1653>shower<s%> to come <S%H3381>down<s%> in its <S%H6256>season<s%>; there shall be <S%H1653>showers<s%> of <S%H1293>blessing<s%>.

And the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H2981>increase<s%>, and they shall be <S%H983>secure<s%> in their <S%H127>land<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, when I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4133>bars<s%> of their <S%H5923>yoke<s%>, and have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those that made bondmen of <S%H5647>them<s%>.

And they shall no more be a <S%H957>prey<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, neither shall the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H3427>them<s%>; but they shall dwell <S%H983>securely<s%>, and none shall make them <S%H2729>afraid<s%>.

And I will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> unto them a <S%H4302>plantation<s%> for <S%H8034>renown<s%>, and they shall be no more <S%H622>consumed<s%> with <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, neither <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H3639>shame<s%> of the nations any <S%H1471>more<s%>.

And they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, their <S%H430>God<s%> am with <S%H1004>them<s%>, and that they, the house of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, are my <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H859>ye<s%> my <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of my <S%H4830>pasture<s%>, are <S%H120>men<s%>, and I am your <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
